trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Expõe tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> à Automação de Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabControlAutomationPeer" /> that is the parent of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabControlAutomationPeer" /> que é o pai deste <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controle para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: Chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.TabItem" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: O valor de enumeração <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.TabItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de elementos filho do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: Chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de elementos filho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "TabItem".
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém "TabItem".

trans-unit.source: Gets the text label of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o rótulo de texto do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" />.
trans-unit.target: Chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" />.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the label.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres que contém o rótulo.

trans-unit.source: If set, this method returns the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name" /> property; otherwise this method will return the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Se definido, esse método retornará o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name" />; caso contrário, esse método retornará o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header" />.

trans-unit.source: The name property can be thought of as the string of text that a user would use to explain which control is being referred to.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de nome pode ser pensada como a cadeia de caracteres de texto que um usuário deseja usar para explicar o que controle se refere.

trans-unit.source: It is important to have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: É importante ter uma representação textual para todos os controles de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] para que você pode consultar programaticamente o controle de maneira localizada.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo ou membro dá suporte à infraestrutura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e não se destina a ser usado diretamente do código.
